thanks for this. had read the book a long time ago. did not know there was a comic series as well. thanks again.
Hi, this downloaded really fast and looks awesome - but how do I read the files? They don't open with any normal document/picture viewing programs..  Thanks
either get the comic book reader program or just change the file type from cbr to rar and extract, quick and easy and it will all be in a folder
Thanks! This is awesome! Much kudos to the original uploader and all the seeders!
